overview: Gong Chul cares for his new wife Eun Mi who cannot walk after a terrible accident. Enter the sexy maid Yeong Joo who comforts Gong Chul who is tired of caring for Eun Mi. The two grow closer at home and Eun Mi witnesses it. Yeong Eun sees that Eun Mi is sad and cold and says something Eun Mi can’t quite understand. Then, Eun Mi recalls the shocking past and her accident that had been suppressed in her memory.
title: The Maid’s Comfort Food
